title: "An unexpected error has occurred"
body: I can't seem to log in even though my password is correct. My internet connection is also fine. Are there any solutions for this problem?

replies.body: This error can happen if your connection is failing to reach the authentication server.  Though your internet is fine, it doesn't make you immune from accessing specific services.  The steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help fix this up by removing any blocks along the way.  I hope that helps get you back in.
